website_summaries.verdict: Ryka presents its own take on the clunky shoe trend with the Nova trainer. Along with style, the trainer also ticks all the boxes of an everyday walking shoe. Its broad base and generous cushioning have been lauded by many. However, it may not be the best option for those who need arch support in their footwear.
pros: Most purchasers are happy that the Ryka Nova feels comfortable right out of the box
The shoe provides ample cushioning for all-day walking and standing, according to multiple reviews
Several people have appreciated the broad platform as it helps them feel more stable
The model offers a balance of warmth and breathability which makes it perfect for fall and spring
Some people also take note of the trainer’s “Dad-shoe” vibe
cons: A few wearers wish for a more supportive insole
According to them, other Ryka walking shoes have better arch support
The laces appeared too long for a couple of testers

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful supportive sneaker
customer_reviews.text: These are great comfortable sneaks. I love ryka, made just for womem. I have a mesh ryka for summer walks which i love as no lining under the mesh so very cool but needed a heavier warmer one for colder fall into early winter then spring and these are perfect. Extremely comfortable right out of the box, good arch support. Very well made sturdy shoe. I actually returned this one as i found a bit cheaper and in a color i wanted more that the gray but its a great sneaker!
customer_reviews.author: susieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Seems Heel Is Low For Ryka & Slips Out With Every Step
customer_reviews.text: Bought both grey and black. Black is larger than grey. Put insole from old Ryka's into black pair as I love the style. Both still slip upward on the heel. Either heel is low or size is too large. Thing is, grey fits great save for slight heel slippage. Black fits better with additional insole. Both still flip, so gave 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Covets Owls

customer_reviews.title: Clunkier than I expected for a walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Fit was as expected. At first, seemed to not be wide enough but comfortable after wearing a few minutes. I didn't expect a clunky, chunky shoe for a walking shoe. Looks more like a running shoe with the wide soles. However, the picture was accurate. These look nothing like the usual Ryka shoe. Tried them on and wore them for about an hour before I realized I was still wearing them. Guess that means they are comfortable. Time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Dale K

customer_reviews.title: O.K. but not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers where somewhat strange : the looked huge when I got them, but I found they were the size 9w that I ordered: however, seemed long and very wide toe box. I got used to them but like the Dash 2 better.
customer_reviews.author: Diane S.Lindquist

customer_reviews.title: Don’t order wide unless you really need it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for work. They were too wide and alittle clumsy like. I ordered the wide to give me more room in the toe box but should have stayed with a medium. Also wasn’t a fan of the color. Looked like an older man shoe.
customer_reviews.author: wendy s.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & supportive
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable right out of the box! Supportive enough to wear while working out. I ordered my usual 6.5 m size and the fit is true to size. Laces are very long so I tuck them in. The grey color will go well with leggings or jeans!
customer_reviews.author: flomote

customer_reviews.title: Love Ryka, have worn them for years.
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I wear a 9, always buy 9.5; have never had a problem. I want another pair in dark blue but my size isn't available, hope they'll restock soon.
customer_reviews.author: bayoaks

customer_reviews.title: Received stained shoes
customer_reviews.text: No quality control for this vendor. Received a shoe with a huge sticky stain on top. What a waste of time and effort.
customer_reviews.author: ElvNat

customer_reviews.title: Ryka for women
customer_reviews.text: My old pair of Ryka sneakers wore out and when looking for replacements I contacted the company for a referral. Although it took a while to get a response (COVID related....) they recommended a style. Worked out well for me...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Going to walk a 10K and this shoe gives me the balance I need.
customer_reviews.author: Nonnie4

customer_reviews.title: Ryka always delivers the best!
customer_reviews.text: I was not disappointed- these shoes fit like a glove, comfortable and supportive. No breaking in time was needed. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dorthea Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Nice walking shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent walking shoe. This was my first time purchasing this brand for myself. I ordered two different styles and am very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Malsmum

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: This shoe (ordered 9W) has a very broad foot base that provides great support!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: These fit as a previous pair I had. Extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.author: cie

customer_reviews.title: Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes I’ve ever invested money into. I will definitely buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jada R. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazon is the best place to shop on line
customer_reviews.text: I forgot that Rykas was a good shoe to walk and I love everything about them
customer_reviews.author: michelle lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes!!!
customer_reviews.text: The are comfortable and are better than other big named brands.
customer_reviews.author: JANET E RUIZ

customer_reviews.title: Found a winner!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this with a few other pairs of Ryka walking shoes. This pair is a keeper. The others were too loose in the heels or to tight in the width..... these were "just right." Went out for a walk immediately. Had to lace them just right. The width gave my toes room to wiggle, the heel was perfect after lacing correctly. The inner sole is what was awesome. Not to spongy that it gives an unstable feel, but not hard to make the bottom of my foot feel uncomfortable. This is my first Ryka shoe.
customer_reviews.author: julieg

customer_reviews.title: These will go walking in Europe where it's cold
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Nova which I bought in grey, go with everythi9ng. I usually wear a 7M but got the 7W because my fee tend to swell after a lot of walking and I'm looking for comfort. These are a little heavier than my other Rykas, but they are intended to be worn with socks and provide all day comfort - as in 11 hour cruise excursions. I've added my Dr. Shoals inserts for added arch support. My other Rykas are a blue mesh for walking in Spring, Summer, Fall and a pair of water shoes for onboard cruise ship on slippery decks and to the beach. Ryka are my go to sneakers now..
customer_reviews.author: Halekoka

product_meta.title: Ryka Women's Nova Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: The "Dad sneaker" Is back with a made for women twist. This fresh, on trend style with a sleek and substantial sole add the ultimate in comfort and support. A mixed-material upper with mesh, leather and suede add interest, while a chunky outsole with a full rubber plate an rubber wrap-up provide the ultimate in stability.
feature_bullets: Full rubber plate with rubber wrap-up to provide the ultimate in stability
International products have separate terms, are sold from abroad and may differ from local products, including fit, age ratings, and language of product, labeling or instructions.
